title: Fulmen Infra Phases Metadata
description: Metadata object describing infrastructure deployment phase characteristics and dependencies

description.description: Overview of phase purpose and typical operations

order.description: Execution sequence (0=first; same order indicates parallelizable phases)

parallel.description: Allow concurrent execution within same order group

deps.description: Phase dependencies (references to other phase keys)

procedural.description: Allows script/SDK procedural calls beyond declarative IaC
